submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        hh=[-h for h in horizontalCut]
        vh=[-v for v in verticalCut]
        heapify(hh)
        heapify(vh)
        
        hc=vc=0
        cost=0
        while hh and vh:
            if -hh[0]>-vh[0]:
                x=heappop(hh)
                cost+=(vc+1)*(-x)
                hc+=1
            else:
                x=heappop(vh)
                cost+=(hc+1)*(-x)
                vc+=1
        while hh:
            x=heappop(hh)
            cost+=(vc+1)*(-x)
            hc+=1
        while vh:
            x=heappop(vh)
            cost+=(hc+1)*(-x)
            vc+=1
        return cost
